players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I believe we need to focus our efforts on identifying the mafia among us. Let's be vigilant and observe each other's behavior carefully during this game."
Charlie: "I will remain vigilant and cooperate with the group."
Bob: "I agree with Alice's suggestion to focus on identifying the mafia. I will also try my best to cooperate and provide any useful information I may have."
Charlie: "Let's work together to ensure we can identify the mafia and keep our village safe. I'll share any information that could help us solve this mystery."

You: "I believe we made a significant progress last night. With Diana's unfortunate demise, it's important that we keep our guard up and continue to work together to identify the mafia among us. Let's also remember that as villagers, we all..."

Bob: "Based on the information we have so far, I believe it's important that we remain focused on identifying the mafia among us. Given that one of us has already been identified as a mafioso, I think it's crucial that we continue to work..."
